item.title: Premature Infants Need Extra Care During First 5 Years
item.description: Premature infants face greater health challenges and require more healthcare services in their first 5 years than those born full term, a study finds....

item.description: Drug interactions with common medications may change pharmacokinetics and increase side effects. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Sex Hormones Drive Blood Pressure Regulation
item.description: New data from a systematic review highlight the need for sex-specific hypertension management. Medscape Medical News
